info.name: Clean Yahoo Mail
info.description:
Removes the right sidebar, moving the settings to the bar above.</br>
Removes the inline bar at the top of the inbox.</br>
Removes the feedback popup at the bottom left and the holiday card popup.
info.additionalInfo:
2017 December 25th - Removed the holiday card popup
2017 November 5th - Updated for new theme
2017 June 1st - Initial Creation
